duties_responsibilities.duty: Handling customer/client/contra calls, processing client disbursements, customer correspondence, transfer of accounts, wired funds, and received/issued checks.
Being articulate, having a pleasant telephone manner, and having excellent verbal and written skills.
Having flexibility in the role and being comfortable with direct client interaction, networking, research, and resolving client operational issues.
Having general PC skills including experience with Word, Excel, and Outlook.

education_certification.credential: Previous financial operations/processing (banking, mortgage, brokerage, Insurance)
